markdown.content: About the Art

College have been very cruel recently, but I finally managed to make a full digital piece!!!

As said before, I haven't had too much time recently to practice art in gerenal, so I didn't want to go full ambitious in this one. Thus, I went with the basic character-looking-to-the-camera composition to warm up and also test some new brushes I found.

For some time now I wanted to incorporate a more painterly texture to my digital pieces - make my digital art more imperfect, one could also say - But I struggled a lot trying to find a way to replicate those textures in a digital canvas. I won't say I finally found the magical brushes of my dreams, but wojtryb's brush pack are definitely a step closer to my vision!
